description: This file defines a Flutter widget called RatingChip, which displays a stylized rating with an icon and text, using theme colors and customized decorations.

classes.name: RatingChip
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a rating with a styled appearance, including an icon and numeric rating.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the RatingChip, including styling, icon, and rating text.
